item.title: Froseph Goes on the Deep Breath Tour
item.content_encoded: - Froseph is going on tour this summer with the Wild Nettle Bookmobile, an anarchist literature and arts & crafts distributor from Winona, MN and his latest album "Deep Breath." The usual CrimethInc. wares will be accompanied by harder-to-find arts & crafts projects, CDs, shirts, patches, and zines, along with monsterous amounts of free literature. Also available will be an exciting project put together by the CrimethInc. Gleeful Ludic Throng. It's a new Hunter/Gatherer Audio Zine with a haunting sound and fancy letterpressed casing. The purpose of the Deep Breath Tour is very simple: To stimulate the magic and intimacy already present in the communities being visited while teaching and learning with one another to build a stronger network of resistance to dominant culture — this is a big summer and there is a lot to talk about. The following dates are either confirmed or pending — still needing help with those! — and, as you can see, many are still open. If you live in any of the pending stops or between any towns listed below and would like to host this, email froseph@crimethinc.com to start collaborating. An intimate house show in a basement, living room, or backyard with other DIY acts from the area and/or traveling through would be ideal. But any park, infoshop, or community center would be great, too. Also, this tour would like to visit as many small towns as possible. THE ITINERARY: June 30th - Winona, MN DDBC Bicycle Co-op, 129 Walnut St. 8pm w/ preceding benefit art auction for the Down N' Dirty Bike Club July 2nd - Viroqua, WI The Shack, 607 E South St. 8pm July 3rd - Madison, WI Lothlorien Co-op, 244 LakeLawn 8pm w/Thistle. This will be a benefit show for the GrassRoutes Caravan, a bicycle village of resistance traveling to the RNC protests in St. Paul, MN. July 5th - Minneapolis, MN TBA July 6th - St. Cloud, MN TBA July 7th - Bemidji, MN Gypsy Cabin, 11413 Lumberjack Rd NW 5:45 fancy dinner followed by campfire & music w/ Shannon Murray & friends Call Shannon at (218) 368-8002 for directions July 8th - Duluth, MN (pending) July 9th - Appleton, WI (pending) July 10th - Oshkosh, WI TBA July 11th - Manitowoc, WI The Treehouse 8pm 806A Buffalo St. w/Saddleshoes July 15th–20th - Milwaukee, WI CrimethInc. Convergence July 21st - Chicago, IL (pending) July 22nd - Fort Wayne, IN (pending) July 23rd - Kalamazoo, MI (pending) July 25th - Buffalo, NY w/ From The Depths July 27th - Pittsburgh, PA (pending) July 28th - Punxsutawney, PA (pending) August 1st - Warwick, NJ Stanley Demming Park w/ Shoelacetown Anarchist Black Cross, Passionate Existence Distro, A Longing for Collapse Press, G.U.T.S Distro, and Easy As ABC. Also, a potluck dinner and a game of Manhunt. August 3rd - New York, NY TBA August 4th - Easton, PA Riverside Park, Larry Holmes Dr. w/ TBA August 5th - Philadelphia, PA TBA. Will be here for at least a few days on break. August 11 - Baltimore, MD (pending) August 12th - Washington D.C. (pending) August 13th - Richmond, VA (pending) August 15th - Athens, OH (pending) August 17th - Lexington, KY TBA August 21st - Des Moines, IA w/ The Rice & Bean Underground

wp_comment.wp_comment_content: Any plans to come over to the west coast? I'm feeling left out.
The des moines show is actually AT The Rice and Bean Underground. with Tu Bab Bu, Pe(A)ce Pip(E), Coonlanderz, TBA. more info soon.
make that Koonlanders, along with The Powerplant. contact thericeandbeanunderground (@) gmail

Anyone know if they've got a place for the Lexington, KY stop? If not, I know a few contacts there likely to lend a hand (or a space).
- Miz L. litera2.0 [at] gmail.com

alright, final line up, for des moines, i think. froseph, the powerplant, sandman, moustaches, taterbug, jd medley, koonlanderz, tubabu, + the wild nettle bookmobile and sandman and moustaches have a documentary crew with them. 5pm at the rice & bean underground (a private farm) email thericeandbeanunderground@gmail.com for questions/directions
